astra.lang

Class Cartago

  • java.lang.Object
    • astra.core.Module
      • astra.lang.Cartago

  • public class Cartago
extends astra.core.Module
    This API provides additional support for the CArtAgO integration.

    CArtAgO is an environment infrastructure. Support for it is provided as a core part of ASTRA in terms of custom events, statements and formulae. This API provides additional support for deplyoing and configuring CArtAgO environments.

    Author:
    Rem Collier

      • auto_action

        public boolean auto_action(astra.core.Intention context,
                           astra.formula.Predicate action)
        Use of SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATIONS annotation to stop the interpreter from notifying itself on completion of the action. For CArtAgO, notification is done asynchronously when the operation actually completes... This is handled within the CartagoAPI class.
        Parameters:
        context -
        action -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        cartago.CartagoException
